item.title: Summer add a quote by Barry Lyga
item.description: "One time you told me that the opposite of love isn't hate. And I didn't understand that, but I think I do know. Because if you hate someone, you most still care, right? You have to care a little bit; otherwise you would just ignore them and forget they even live. Or lived." -- Barry Lyga

item.title: Summer add a quote by Barry Lyga
item.description: "This is why I forgive, but I don't forget. When you forget someone, the forgiveness doesn't mean anything anymore." -- Barry Lyga

item.title: Summer add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "People are wonderful. I love individuals. I hate groups of people. I hate a group of people with a 'common purpose'. 'Cause pretty soon they have little hats. And armbands. And fight songs. And a list of people they're going to visit at 3am. So, I dislike and despise groups of people but I love individuals. Every person you look at; you can see the universe in their eyes, if you're really looking." -- George Carlin

item.title: Summer add a quote by Jennifer Brown
item.description: "Being pretty isn't everything but sometimes being ugly is." -- Jennifer Brown

item.title: Summer add a quote by Chris Crutcher
item.description: " And I think if you're going to be with somebody, you owe it to them to show yourself. " -- Chris Crutcher

item.title: Summer add a quote by Chris Crutcher
item.description: " No amount of effort could have stopped that, because our points of view - the way we perceive things - are inextricably linked to our beliefs, ... ,our beliefs color what we see. " -- Chris Crutcher
